title: Possible to remove my game restriction?
body:
It kicked me out of a room because it wouldn't let me ban a champion.  I clicked my champion to ban, and clicked ban 15 times, and the timer hit zero.  The timer STAYED at zero for awhile before the room crashed and sent me back.  Now I have to wait 30 mins before i can' play again, and it wasn't my fault because i ACTUALLY BANNED a champion.  

Possible to remove temporary game thing?

replies.body:
A 30 minute lower priority queue would be the result of multiple[ queue dodges](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Meaning, it sounds like you've got an an issue that needs to get fixed up so your timer doesn't continue to escalate.  The only way to remove it is to play your match without interruptions.  Even if it's out of your control leaving or dodging causes negative experiences for other players, so I recommend troubleshooting the issue.  

Based on your description, it sounds like you are losing sync at champion select and getting left out.  This can be the result of a weak network or even being on wi-fi.  As Rineyy suggested, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can get you fixed up.  Hope that helps!

It's not possible to remove the queue dodge penalty. 

Disconnects in Champ Select are usually due to an unstable connection with the LoL servers however. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
